item.title: Perceptual Learning == More Ruby Experts?
item.description: Hi, nice seeing you here! Thanks for checking out Perceptual Learning == More Ruby experts?. This talk was first presented at RubyConf2021. You can find the slides and the resources mentioned in this talk below: Slides üñºÔ∏è Resources mentioned in this talk üìñ Introduction I am Stefanni. Here at hexdevs, I research, design and develop programs to help you become an expert developer. Ever since I found out about Perceptual Learning in the book “Badass - Making users awesome”, from Kathy Sierra, I got really curious to learn more about the science behind Perceptual Learning.
